summary: THE RIGHT WHEEL BEARING NEEDED TO BE REPLACED.  THE DEALER STATED  THE BEARING HAD FELL OF WHEN THE WHEEL WAS REMOVED.  THE LEFT WHEEL BEARING NEEDED TO BE REPLACED DUE TO A WOBBLE.  IN ORDER TO STOP THE WOBBLE, THE CONSUMER HAD THE BEARING REPLACED ALONG WITH A PURCHASE OF FOUR NEW TIRES.  MR  SCC  *JB
